suggestions: Add semicolon at the end of the signal declaration: 'signal shreg : std_logic_vector(DEPTH - 1 downto 0);'
issues.reasoning: VHDL requires semicolons to terminate signal declarations. Missing semicolon will cause compilation error.

issues.description: Missing 'end if' for inner if statement checking 'clken = '1''
suggestions: Add 'end if;' before the outer 'end if;' to close the inner if statement
issues.reasoning: Each if statement requires a matching end if. The nested if statement starting at line 22 is missing its closing 'end if', which will cause a compilation error.
